verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, called <S%G2822><s%> to be an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Sosthenes <S%G4988><s%> our brother <S%G80><s%>,

unto the church <S%G1577><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which is <S%G5607><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Corinth <S%G2882><s%>, even them that are sanctified <S%G37><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, called <S%G2822><s%> to be saints <S%G40><s%>, with <S%G4862><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that call upon <S%G1941><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> place <S%G5117><s%>, <S%G5037><s%> their <S%G846><s%> Lord and <S%G2532><s%> ours <S%G2257><s%>:

Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

I thank <S%G2168><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, for <S%G1909><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which was <S%G3588><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G5213><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>;

that <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> ye were enriched <S%G4148><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> utterance <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%>;
even as <S%G2531><s%> the testimony <S%G3142><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> was confirmed <S%G950><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>:

so that <S%G5620><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> come behind <S%G5302><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> no3361, 3367 gift <S%G5486><s%>; waiting for <S%G553><s%> the revelation <S%G602><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>;

who shall <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> confirm <S%G950><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%>, that ye be unreproveable <S%G410><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

God <S%G2316><s%> is faithful <S%G4103><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> ye were called <S%G2564><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G3004><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> speak <S%G3004><s%> the same thing <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that there be <S%G5600><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> divisions <S%G4978><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> that ye be <S%G5600><s%> perfected together <S%G2675><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G3563><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> judgment <S%G1106><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it hath been signified <S%G1213><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, by <S%G5259><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> that are of the household of Chloe <S%G5514><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> contentions <S%G2054><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> I mean <S%G3004><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> each one <S%G1538><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%>, I1473, Ezekiel3 am <S%G1510><s%> of Paul <S%G3972><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> of Apollos <S%G625><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> of Cephas <S%G2786><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

Is <S%G3307><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> divided <S%G3307><s%>? <S%G3361><s%> was <S%G4717><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> crucified <S%G4717><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>? or <S%G2228><s%> were ye baptized <S%G907><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Paul <S%G3972><s%>?
I thank <S%G2168><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I baptized <S%G907><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%>, save1487, 3361 Crispus <S%G2921><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Gaius <S%G1050><s%>;
lest2443, 3361 any <S%G5100><s%> man should say <S%G2036><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye were baptized <S%G907><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I baptized <S%G907><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the household <S%G3624><s%> of Stephanas <S%G4734><s%>: besides <S%G3063><s%>, I know <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> whether <S%G1487><s%> I baptized <S%G907><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> other <S%G243><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to baptize <S%G907><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> to preach the gospel <S%G2097><s%>: not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of words <S%G3056><s%>, lest2443, 3361 the cross <S%G4716><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> should be made void <S%G2758><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the cross <S%G4716><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> to them <S%G3588><s%> that perish622, Ezekiel3 foolishness <S%G3472><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> who are saved <S%G4982><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, I will destroy <S%G622><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of the wise <S%G4680><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> the discernment <S%G4907><s%> of the discerning <S%G4908><s%> will I bring to nought <S%G114><s%>.

Where <S%G4226><s%> is the wise <S%G4680><s%>? where <S%G4226><s%> is the scribe <S%G1122><s%>? where <S%G4226><s%> is the disputer <S%G4804><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%>? hath not <S%G3780><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> made foolish <S%G3471><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of the <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> seeing that <S%G1894><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> its wisdom <S%G4678><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, it was God <S%G2316><s%>'s good pleasure <S%G2106><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the foolishness <S%G3472><s%> of the preaching <S%G2782><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> that believe <S%G4100><s%>.
Seeing1894, 2532 that Jews <S%G2453><s%> ask <S%G154><s%> for signs <S%G4592><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Greeks <S%G1672><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> after wisdom <S%G4678><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> preach <S%G2784><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> crucified <S%G4717><s%>, unto Jews2453, Ezekiel3 a stumblingblock <S%G4625><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> unto Gentiles <S%G1672><s%> foolishness <S%G3472><s%>;

but <S%G1161><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> are called <S%G2822><s%>, both <S%G5037><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Greeks <S%G1672><s%>, Christ <S%G5547><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

Because <S%G3754><s%> the foolishness <S%G3474><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> wiser <S%G4680><s%> than men <S%G444><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the weakness <S%G772><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> stronger <S%G2478><s%> than men <S%G444><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> behold <S%G991><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> calling <S%G2821><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> mighty <S%G1415><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> noble <S%G2104><s%>, are called:

but <S%G235><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> chose <S%G1586><s%> the foolish things <S%G3474><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>, that he might put to <S%G2443><s%> shame <S%G2617><s%> them that are wise <S%G4680><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> chose <S%G1586><s%> the weak things <S%G772><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>, that he might put to <S%G2443><s%> shame <S%G2617><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> that are strong <S%G2478><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> the base things <S%G36><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> that are despised <S%G1848><s%>, did <S%G1586><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> choose <S%G1586><s%>, yea and <S%G2532><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> that are <S%G5607><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, that he might bring to <S%G2443><s%> nought <S%G2673><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> that are <S%G5607><s%>:
that <S%G3704><s%> no3361, 3956 flesh <S%G4561><s%> should glory <S%G2744><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> him <S%G846><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sanctification <S%G38><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> redemption <S%G629><s%>:
that <S%G2443><s%>, according as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, He <S%G3588><s%> that glorieth <S%G2744><s%>, let him glory <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.
